show.title: Investing in Regenerative Agriculture and Food

title: 71 Yasmine Svan, why a 1.3 trillion asset manager is asking questions about soil health
subtitle: 71 Yasmine Svan, why a 1.3 trillion asset manager is asking questions about soil health
summary:
Yasmine Svan is Sustainability Analyst at Legal & General Investment Management, one of the largest asset mangers in Europe.
